parameter-group.name: regional
parameter-group.label: Regional Settings
parameter-group.description: Overall regional configuration of the openHAB instance.

parameter-group.name: unit
parameter-group.label: Unit Settings
parameter-group.description: Configuration of units of measurement system.

parameter.name: language
parameter.label: Language
parameter.description: The default language that should be used. If not specified, the system default locale is used.

parameter.name: script
parameter.label: Script
parameter.description: The script that should be used.

parameter.name: region
parameter.label: Country / Region
parameter.description: The region that should be used.

parameter.name: variant
parameter.label: Variant
parameter.description: A variation of the Locale. Any arbitrary value used to indicate a variation of a Locale.

parameter.name: timezone
parameter.label: Time Zone
parameter.description: A time zone can be set from the user interface. The underlying system's time zone is the default.

parameter.name: location
parameter.label: Location
parameter.description:
The location of this installation.
Coordinates as <latitude>,<longitude>[<altitude>]
Example: "52.5200066,13.4049540" (Berlin)

parameter.name: dayset-weekend
parameter.label: Weekend Days
parameter.description: List of usual non workable days.

parameter.name: country
parameter.label: Country
parameter.description: Get the holidays for a specific country (e.g. United States of America = "us"). Default is taken from the country/region setting.

parameter.name: region
parameter.label: Region
parameter.description: Get the holidays for a specific state (e.g. New York = "ny").

parameter.name: city
parameter.label: City
parameter.description: Get the holidays for a specific city (e.g. New York City = "nyc").

parameter.name: currencyProvider
parameter.label: Currency Provider
parameter.description: The service that is used to provide a set of currencies and their exchange rates.

parameter.name: fixedBaseCurrency
parameter.label: Fixed Base Currency
parameter.description: The base currency of this system when the fixed currency provider is used. Default is used from the country/region setting.

parameter.name: measurementSystem
parameter.label: Measurement System
parameter.description: The measurement system that is used for unit conversion.
